title: I’ll Pay Attention!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Kotori-saaan, sorry to keep you waiting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ruby-chan! Good afternoon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Good afternoon. Ruby is so excited for A・ZU・NA’s live.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Yeah, me too! I’m looking forward to their performance, of course, but....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>You’re more curious to see their outfits, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Absolutely! Their previous outfit was super cute, wasn’t it? I was surprised when they pulled out a handkerchief from their pouches.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It had all kinds of stuff on it, like something straight out of a toybox, right? Ruby wonders what sort of outfit they’ll wear today....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>You know, I actually brought binoculars with me.... Because I really wanted to see all the intricate details....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeh!? Umm.... Ruby also brought one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu. It’s a great outfit for people that love western-style clothing, after all, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
